text: LexCorp, also known as LuthorCorp and L-Corp, (legally known as Lexcorp Incorporated) is a fictional organized crime company appearing in American comic books published by DC Comics, commonly in Superman stories. It is a conglomerate owned and run by Superman villain Lex Luthor, headquartered in New Troy, Metropolis. == In other media == The organization has appeared in different forms of media, including movies, television series, and video games. Category:DC Comics Category:Fictional organizations
title: LexCorp
